00031 W.request = function(url, callback){
00032   var jump = this.loader;
00033   //jump.src = 'http://api.local.yahoo.com/MapsService/V1/geocode?appid=YahooDemo&street=701+First+Street&city=Sunnyvale&state=CA';
00034   jump.src = url;
00035     jump.onload = function(){
00036       var data = jump.contentDocument?jump.contentDocument.body.innerHTML:
00037       jump.contentWindow.document.body.innerHTML;
00038       // strip off '<pre>' tag
00039       data = data.replace(/(<([^>]+)>)/ig,"");
00040       // return to callback
00041       if(callback != null)
00042         callback(data);
00043     };
00044 };

00047 W.proxy_url = 'http://wednus.com/wednus_platform/module/dkernel/test/wrs/wrs.php';
00048 W.proxy = function(url, callback){
00049   if(!callback)
00050     callback = '';
00051   W.js(W.proxy_url +'?callback='+ callback +'&url='+ escape(url));
00052 };

00055 W.opener = document.createElement('iframe');
00059 W.open = function(url){
00060   if(!this.opener.isStarted){
00061   W.style(W.opener, 'width:100%;height:'+ W.height +'px;display:block');
00062   // IE iframe height issue: no 100%
00063     W.event(window, 'onresize', function(){
00064       W.refresh();
00065       W.opener.style.height = W.height +'px';
00066     });
00067     this.opener.isStarted = true;
00068   }
00069 
00070   var isLoaded = false;
00071   W.opener.src = W.path +'module/dkernel/lib/loading.html';
00072   W.opener.onload = function(){load();};
00073   // forgot what was this for
00074   W.opener.onreadystatechange = function(){
00075     if(this.readyState == 'complete')
00076       load();
00077   };
00078 
00079   function load(){
00080     if(!isLoaded){
00081       W.opener.src = url;
00082       isLoaded=true;
00083     }
00084   };
00085 };
00086 
00087 
00088 W.close = function(){
00089   W.opener.style.display = 'none';
00090   W.opener.isStarted = false;
00091 };

00094 W.wrap = function(obj){
00095   var wrapper = document.createElement('div');
00096   wrapper.id = '_wednus_wrapper_';
00097   W.style(wrapper, 'position:absolute;width:100%;height:100%;display:block;overflow:auto;');
00098   wrapper.appendChild(obj);
00099   document.body.appendChild(wrapper);
00100 };

00103 W.write = function(str){
00104   W.style(W.body, 'width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;overflow:auto;');
00105   W.body.innerHTML = str;
00106 };
